hello.heading: My name is Lean Rada
text: I like making stuff and discovering new things.

works.info: Current job. Working on an app called Convene.
Worked on a P2P multiplayer card game on Android that features a disturbing Easter egg.
Made animated, sometimes interactive, Internet advertisements. Indirectly contributed to the rise of ad-blockers.
Made illustrated and animated biochemistry learning materials. Learned much about biology as I went. Did you know that mitochondria are the powerhouse of the cell?

schools.course: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
schools.name: University of the Philippines Manila

text: I am an introvert who likes games, programming, and music.
Apparently, I like creating stuff. Stuff like doodles, music, animations, video games, systems, game engines, and more.
I also enjoy consuming things. Things like art, film, music, algorithms, architecture (software), engineering, and design. I'm more interested in the processes than the products themselves.
I like tinkering with things. I have broken and fixed my computer countless times and spent a lot of my youth toying with map editors or mod stuff in video games.
Learning is fun, but I fail at practice.
Most of all, I enjoy laughing with friends and just having a good time and writing cheesy 'About me' section endings. And corny jokes.
Thank you for looking at my webpage.
